name: In Car VR Parking 2017 - Miami Edition
name_original: In Car VR Parking 2017 - Miami Edition
description:
Park like you’ve never parked before. New In-Car VR view puts you in the drivers seat as you attempt to park your car or truck around town.

Race to the asphalt to beat your rivals to the highway. Watch out for oncoming traffic and other hazards. With a huge city, loads of levels and a dozen gorgeous supercars to choose from, this game will have you busy for quite a while.

FEATURES

-Awesome realistic driving physics.
-Accurate sports cars & jeeps with full interiors.
-Insane dynamic traffic.
-Huge costal city of Miami to explore.
-12 accurate, real-life cars!
